title: Workspace accessibility
test_description: Validate that the Databricks workspace is accessible
parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const workspaceStep = stepResults.get_workspace_list; if (workspaceStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'No response received from API', code: 'NO_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-101-1', title: 'Workspace accessibility' }; } const apiOutput = workspaceStep.data; if (apiOutput.objects && Array.isArray(apiOutput.objects)) { const validObjects = apiOutput.objects.every(obj => { return obj.object_id !== undefined && typeof obj.object_type === 'string' && typeof obj.path === 'string'; }); if (validObjects) { return { status: 'pass', message: 'Workspace is accessible', code: 'HTTP_200_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-101-1', title: 'Workspace accessibility' }; } else { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Some workspace objects are missing required fields', code: 'INVALID_OBJECT_FORMAT', test_id: 'IQ-101-1', title: 'Workspace accessibility' }; } } else { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Workspace response is not in expected format', code: 'INVALID_RESPONSE_FORMAT', test_id: 'IQ-101-1', title: 'Workspace accessibility' }; } }
